The rear wheel is off the ground, and he appears to be in control of the bike. There is no indication of him falling off the motorcycle in this segment. The dense caption confirms that he is sitting on the motorcycle with its rear wheel off the ground, and there is no mention of a fall.

Since this is the first segment and there is no prior context indicating any falls, we can conclude that the helmeted man has not fallen off the motorcycle yet. Therefore, the option that states he does not fall off the motorcycle in the video is the most plausible at this point.
